name: snapshot (itch) (Bian Pasiliao, Tomasz Wiercioch)
description:
!!! IMPORTANT READ ME !!!

The ending is currently inaccessible due to a bug we couldn't fix in time for the jam deadline. If you've reached a point in the game where you believe you know the date the Happiest Day falls on, go to this link and enter the date as the password in a MM/DD/YY format (ex. January 16 year 3 would be 011603). If you're correct, you'll get to see what the ending looks like. 

(Or play this version with the bug fixed)

-----

You're a ghost with no memories and the power to travel through time. Click through the days, months and years in search of polaroids that may clue you into what's going on. Search for the happiest day of your life.

Credits:

  • Bian Pasiliao
  • Tomasz Wiercioch

Game made for Clicker Jam Winter 2023
